remark.ch: 通訊系110學年度起入學學生之A組(電通訊組)必修課。

goal.en: Students must pass advanced analog microelectronics topics including bipolar/MOS transistor circuits, frequency response, OP circuit, current source circuits, and differential AMP.
goal.ch: 學生須學會電晶體電路分析, 頻率響應, 運算放大器電路, 電流源與差分放大器。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Frequency Response (FR)
2 Bipolar Transistor FR I
3 Bipolar Transistor FR II
4 MOS FR I
5 MOS FR II
6 AMP FR
7 Output Stage and Power Amplifiers
8 PA Circuits
9 The Ideal Operational Amplifier
10 OP Circuits
11 Integrated Circuit Biasing and Active Loads
12 Biasing Circuits I
13 Bias Circuits II
14 Active load Circuits
15 Differential and Multistage Amplifiers
16 Differential Circuits
17 Multistage OP
18 Final Exam
